basic.description: Advanced seminar/workshop in an area of film or video production, generally involving intensive analysis of existing work and practical assignments.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Production: Special Topic I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and [a grade of B- in FILM110 (or104&106)and FILM250] and 18.0 units in FILM and registration in a FILM Plan, or COFI subplan or STSC Specialization Plan.
